prompts.title: Luxury Beach Convertible Fashion
prompts.prompt:
Ultra-realistic portrait of the same woman from the reference image (her face, eyes, nose, lips, ears, proportions, and body shape must remain 100% identical, unchanged). Ultra photorealistic fashion portrait of the same woman from the reference photo, identity locked (do not alter facial features). Use the exact same face. Preserve the original person's identity, face, and physical features with high likeness. Do not alter their face. Apply the following style: Here's a detailed prompt based on the photo:
A young woman stands beside a white convertible car with the door open at a beach during golden hour sunset. She is photographed from behind, looking back over her shoulder toward the camera. She has long, flowing brown hair with subtle highlights that catches the warm sunset light. Her makeup features soft contouring and red lipstick. She wears large gold hoop earrings and a chunky gold chain choker necklace around her neck. A gold watch or bracelet adorns her wrist, and she wears multiple gold rings on her fingers. Her outfit consists of a vibrant red bodysuit or tank top with thin spaghetti straps and a plunging back, paired with high-waisted medium-wash blue jeans that show the back pockets and brown leather belt. One hand is raised to her hair in an elegant pose. The white convertible beside her has its top down, revealing black leather interior and a visible steering wheel. The beach setting features calm ocean waves in the background with a soft, hazy horizon. A tall building or hotel structure is visible in the distance on the shoreline. The sky has a warm, peachy-beige tone typical of sunset or golden hour. The lighting is soft, warm, and diffused, creating a dreamy, romantic atmosphere. A subtle sparkle effect appears in the bottom right corner. The overall aesthetic is glamorous, summery, and cinematic, evoking a luxury coastal lifestyle with fashion-forward styling." This prompt captures all the essential details of composition, styling, setting, lighting, and atmosphere of the photograph.

prompts.title: Paper Relief Fantasy Illustration
prompts.prompt:
An illustration style that transforms figures into layered paper-cut relief art. The artwork appears handcrafted, with torn edges, folded textures, embossed surfaces, and overlapping layers of paper creating depth and strong shadows. The visual compositions resemble intricate 3D paper sculptures mounted on a crisp white background.
The color palette is rich and theatrical, dominated by warm reds, burnt oranges, turquoises, jade greens, ivories, and soft golds. The surfaces show visible creases, wrinkles, and grain of the paper, giving a tactile and handmade feel. The lighting is soft but directional, emphasizing depth, layered shadows, and dimensional realism.
Graphic elements such as playing cards, suit symbols (hearts, diamonds, clubs, spades), calligraphic marks, and typographic fragments are integrated into the compositions as floating or embedded collage elements. The overall aesthetic blends fine art illustration, papercraft sculpture, editorial poster design, and fantasy storytelling.
The style feels elegant yet dramatic, cinematic yet artistic—like a high-end piece of art or a collectible art card. Sharp silhouette clarity, intricate layering, and balanced asymmetry.
Visual characteristics:
Paper relief art, layered papercraft, paper-cut illustration
Handmade collage aesthetic, sculptural depth, tactile texture
Editorial fantasy illustration, art book quality, highly detailed
Soft studio lighting, shallow shadows, museum display look.
Negative Prompt (Recommended)
Photorealistic, flat illustration, digital painting, oil painting, watercolor, anime, cartoon style, subtle gradients, CGI, plastic texture, low detail

prompts.title: Intense Poolside Gaze
prompts.prompt:
A man captured in a swimming pool at close range, turned directly toward the camera with a penetrating, intense gaze. The composition frames him from mid-chest upward, showcasing his bare shoulders and upper torso partially submerged in water—no clothing visible above the waist.
Lighting & Mood:
• Dark, moody, cinematic aesthetic with cool color grading
• Dramatic side or key lighting that sculpts his facial features and musculature
• Deep blue and black tones dominating the background
• Subtle reflections from pool water catching light across wet skin, creating texture and dimension
• High contrast between the subject’s face and darker surroundings
Technical Specifications:
• Extreme close-up, shallow depth of field (f/1.4-f/2.8 equivalent)
• Sharp focus on his eyes and face; background softly blurred
• Cinematic color grade with desaturated midtones and rich blacks and good lighting 
• Ultra-high resolution, photorealistic quality
• Water droplets and surface tension visible on skin and face
• Professional studio or underwater lighting precision
Composition:
• Subject’s eyes and gaze filling the frame with directional intensity
• Pool water framing the lower half of the composition
• Minimal distracting elements; emphasis on face, gaze, and atmosphere
• Direct eye contact creating psychological connection 
(Use above male face for reference)

prompts.title: Luxury SUV Night Lifestyle
prompts.prompt:
Create an image that features a young man (uploaded photo for 100.999% facial reference) posing confidently in front of a luxury black SUV at night. The scene is set on a modern road, likely a bridge, with a striking blue-lit architectural structure in the background.
Visual Breakdown
Subject: A young man uploaded photo wearing sunglasses, a black quilted bomber jacket over a graphic t-shirt, and slim-fit black trousers. He is leaning against the front of the vehicle with one leg crossed over the other.
The Vehicle: A high-gloss black Range Rover. The front doors are open, revealing a tan or cognac-colored leather interior.
Setting & Lighting:
Background: A large, futuristic bridge with vibrant purple LED ribs arching over the road. The sky is dark with some light cloud cover.
Lighting: The scene is illuminated by warm artificial streetlights that create a golden glow on the asphalt, contrasting with the cool blue light of the bridge and the dark reflections on the car's paint.
Key Details & Observations
Atmosphere: The image has a high-glamour, "lifestyle" aesthetic, typical of luxury car advertisements or influencer social media posts.

prompts.title: Luxury Aircraft Golden Hour Portrait
prompts.prompt: Create a high-end cinematic lifestyle travel portrait derived strictly and exclusively from the uploaded reference photo, with absolute and uncompromising identity preservation. The subject’s face must remain 100% identical to the original image, including exact facial anatomy, bone structure, jawline, nose shape, lip shape, cheek structure, skin texture, exact same eye shape and exact same eye color, and exact same hair color and tone as shown in the uploaded photo, with zero alteration, beautification, stylization, or reinterpretation of identity. The subject is seated inside a modern commercial aircraft cabin, captured in a stable medium shot framing the head, shoulders, torso, and upper thighs, at an eye-level camera angle with a 2:3 aspect ratio. She is positioned in a controlled 3/4 orientation with the face rotated slightly back toward the camera, showing approximately 70–80% of the face, while the body remains angled toward camera-right. Posture is upright and elegant with a subtle natural S-curve, shoulders relaxed, left shoulder slightly dropped to create depth. Her head is gently tilted upward approximately 15–20 degrees with the chin softly extended, gaze fixed off-camera right toward the horizon, maintaining a calm, introspective mood. Her hands rest softly in her lap, partially visible, ensuring a composed and repeatable pose. She wears a deep crimson/burgundy ribbed-knit sweater with a high, soft neckline, layered beneath a tailored charcoal grey wool-blend blazer with classic notch lapels and a matte, light-absorbing texture. Hair remains long, voluminous, and naturally textured, styled in loose waves with a soft off-center part cascading over the right shoulder, with no change to length, volume, or color. Lighting is natural golden-hour side lighting from camera-right acting as both key and rim light, sculpting warm highlights along the facial contours and hair strands, while the camera-left side falls into soft cinematic shadow with subtle ambient fill from the cabin interior. A soft, out-of-focus foreground element—such as the blurred edge of the airplane seat or cabin structure—occupies the lower frame, adding layered depth without obscuring facial features. Outside the airplane window, the sun sits low on the horizon, emitting a rich golden-orange glow; layered clouds form a smooth gradient transitioning from cool blue to warm golden-hour amber, creating a painterly atmospheric backdrop. Color grading is warm and cinematic with dominant amber, gold, and burnt-orange highlights contrasted against muted charcoal and deep plum shadows, slight matte blacks, and selective saturation emphasizing the sunset sky while keeping the cabin interior subtly desaturated. Depth of field is extremely shallow (f/1.8–f/2.8 equivalent), with the subject’s face and window frame sharp while the foreground elements, runway, clouds, and distant aircraft dissolve into creamy bokeh. Composition follows editorial travel photography principles, using foreground layering and the airplane window as a frame-within-a-frame, evoking quiet luxury, serenity, and aspirational cinematic storytelling.

prompts.title: Neo-Western Cowboy Key Art
prompts.prompt: Create a high-end cinematic Neo-Western cowboy movie poster–style composite portrait derived strictly from the uploaded facial reference, with absolute identity preservation and zero tolerance for deviation. The subject’s facial anatomy, bone structure, skin texture, natural pores, exact eye shape, exact eye color, exact hair color, hairline, beard density, scars, and overall facial identity must remain 100% identical to the reference photo. The composition is locked, stable, and repeatable in a vertical 2:3 aspect ratio, with a balanced theatrical layout where the main actor occupies precisely the upper 50% of the frame, and the supporting narrative elements fill the lower 50%. The main actor is framed in a Medium Close-Up (MCU) with a slight low-angle camera, body fixed in a 3/4 turn to the viewer’s left, head turned back toward center, right shoulder subtly lowered, and a controlled 5-degree downward chin tilt, producing a powerful “through-the-brow” gaze directly into the lens. Behind the main actor is a dramatic Western sky, featuring towering storm clouds, layered golden-hour light rays, subtle dust haze, and warm–cool contrast, creating epic scale and emotional tension without overpowering the subject. The outfit remains a late-19th-century outlaw ensemble: a heavy distressed dark-brown leather duster coat with visible wear and abrasion, layered over a desaturated olive-gray plaid flannel shirt worn open at the collar, paired with a charcoal-black wide-brim, high-crown felt Stetson-style cowboy hat with a studded leather band and trail-dust texture. Facial expression is stoic and resolute—eyes slightly narrowed, lips closed in a firm neutral line—projecting authority and hardened resolve. Hair remains exactly the same color and texture as the reference, dark espresso brown, short-to-medium length, tucked under the hat with natural strands visible at the temples, seamlessly blending into a salt-and-pepper beard with crisp micro-contrast. Lighting is cinematic golden hour with dual-source control: a warm directional key light from camera-left creating a Rembrandt triangle on the right cheek, combined with a clean golden rim light separating the silhouette from the sky, with deep low-key shadows under the hat brim. Color grading is modern cinematic, emphasizing warm amber highlights, crushed blacks, restrained skin tones, and subtle orange–teal separation. The lower half of the frame depicts supporting characters—multiple cowboys riding horses across an open frontier plain, smaller in scale, partially silhouetted against dust, sunset glow, and atmospheric depth. The separation between the upper main actor and lower supporting scene is achieved through a soft, seamless gradient blend of light, clouds, dust, and haze, with no hard dividing line and no text elements present. Overall style is high-end theatrical key art, iconic, cinematic, and legend-driven—evoking classic Western film posters with modern hyper-realistic finishing, optimized for consistent, repeatable results across different users.

In the foreground, the same person is shown in reclining on the hood of a vintage black and white modify car, his expression full of attitude

prompts.title: Steel Number Ascent
prompts.prompt:
Generate a 4K photo of a 30 year old man (100% same face the reference photo), dressed like a professional mountaineer-outdoor jacket, climbing harness, carabiner, gloves, and climbing boots-is scaling an extremely high and steep rock wall.
On their back is a massive "6" number, made of heavy stainless steel, tied with ropes, super durable, reflective, and featuring fine scratches.
At the top of the rock, the number "2025" is similarly made of stainless steel, nailed to the rock in a monumental and very heavy-looking manner.
The camera angle is from bottom to top, emphasizing the absurd height of the wall.
A dramatic sky with dark clouds and sunbeams shining through, cinematic lighting, and strong contrast. Hyper-realistic rock texture, sweat, dust, and muscle effort details are visible.

prompts.title: Seaside Saree Elegance
prompts.prompt: Cinematic seaside portrait of a young Woman standing near weathered rocks, ocean breeze lifting her flowing pastel saree. Golden-hour sunlight kisses her skin as pearl jewelry glimmers softly. Waves blur into creamy bokeh while her confident gaze meets the horizon. The palette feels airy and romantic. Ulttra-photorealistic 8K composition with stylish 'Alpk Verse' signature bottom right capturing freedom femininity elegance coastal serenity timeless

prompts.title: Exaggerated Cash King Caricature
prompts.prompt:
Create a highly exaggerated, funny 3D caricature of the person from the reference image.
The character has a huge, oversized head, an enormous wide grin showing teeth, and comically expressive eyes.
Keep a neatly trimmed beard and eyebrows slightly exaggerated for humor.
He is wearing a classic dark suit with a tie, but make the suit slightly exaggerated in size for a comical effect.
The character is holding huge, cartoonishly oversized stacks of cash with some gold coins teetering on top.
A glowing cigar is in his mouth with smoke swirling in funny shapes.
Expression: playful, greedy, mischievous, and ridiculously over-the-top funny.
Background: simple dark gradient, spotlight on the character.
Style: ultra-detailed, Pixar-style meets exaggerated cartoon, bright colors, exaggerated proportions, comic humor vibe.
High-quality 3D render, with dramatic yet funny lighting, emphasizing the caricature features.
